meta_title: Proving Maintenance Was Done Correctly: The Guide to Defensible Data
meta_description: Don't let an audit or lawsuit catch you off guard. Learn how to establish an immutable, courtroom-ready maintenance audit trail that proves compliance and
title: Could Your Logs Survive a Lawsuit? The Ultimate Guide to Proving Maintenance Was Done Correctly

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Could Your Logs Survive a Lawsuit? The Ultimate Guide to Proving Maintenance Was Done Correctly

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a maintenance technician wearing a hard hat, safety glasses, and high-visibility vest is viewed from behind/over-the-shoulder. They are holding a ruggedized tablet. On the tablet screen (which is visible but not the main focus), a green "Verified" checkmark or data visualization is glowing, indicating a completed task. The technician is scanning a digital tag on a large, complex piece of metallic machinery. In the background, slightly out of focus, other diverse workers in PPE are walking or inspecting equipment. The lighting is professional, with cool blue and industrial grey tones, highlighting the technology and cleanliness of the operation. No text overlays.
